CustomField.description: BODEV-1888: Return TRUE when the current Owner is specified in any of the User Lookup field, else FALSE.
CustomField.formula: CASE( $User.Id , OwnerId, 1, BDR_Owner__c, 1, Account_Director__c, 1, Adoption_CSM__c, 1, BDR_Owner__c, 1, CSM_Owner__c, 1, New_Business_Sales_Rep__c, 1, New_Business_Solutions_Owner__c, 1, 0 ) = 1
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Returns TRUE if you are specified in any of the user lookup fields (Account Owner, CSM Owner, etc.).
CustomField.label: Active User Owner
